projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React, JavaScript, JSX
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: MovieHub: Movie Rental Library
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a comprehensive full-stack web application utilizing Flask to create RESTful APIs, Angular for a dynamic frontend experience, and MySQL for robust database management of 1,000,000+ entries.
 - Integrated features for users to rent and review movies, with a sophisticated search and filtering system powered by SQL queries, and personalized movie recommendations based on usersâ€™ rental histories of 1000+ users.

projects.title: Colour Swatches
projects.bodyText:
- Created a dynamic web application by utilizing TypeScript to maintain the backend model and notify frontend components of state changes via Preact Signals, and Object-Oriented Programming (OOP).
 - Enabled users to adjust HSL, RGB, and Hex values for numerous colour swatches, with canvas updates within a frame, also includes features to add, delete, and synchronize colour representations across 10+ unique formats.

projects.title: Biquadris: 2-Player Tetris
projects.bodyText:
- Applied object-oriented programming principles such as inheritance, polymorphism, and design patterns in C++, with added graphic support and unique two-player functionalities, leveraging Bash and Git for version control.
 - Implemented a custom-built graphics library to create a graphical user interface for the game, and integrated a custom-built networking library to enable multiplayer functionality.

projects.title: OS Features & Functionality
projects.bodyText: - Implemented many crucial features for OS/161 in C, developed functionality includes multithreading and concurrency, synchronization, processes (in both kernel and user spaces), virtual memory, page tables, and scheduling algorithms.

projects.title: Connect 4 with Minimax AI
projects.bodyText:
- The game of Connect 4 in Python with a Minimax algorithm and search heuristics with varying depth levels.
 - Play against the Minimax AI agent yourself, play against a friend, or have two Minimax agents play each other!

projects.title: Battleship
projects.bodyText:
- The game of battleship in Python, full documentation and testing is included.
 - Uses Pytest for testing and Sphinx for documentation.
